explanation: Noticed a blue/black bruise at the injection site? This happens if a tiny capillary was hit. It looks scary but is harmless.
next_steps: Apply Ice Pack for 10 mins. Avoid injecting exactly on the bruise tomorrow.
reassurance: It will fade in 3-5 days like any other bruise. It does not affect medication absorption.

explanation: Injection wali jagah par neel (bruise) padna normal hai. Kabhi kabhi choti nas dab jati hai.
next_steps: Barf (Ice) lagayein. Kal dusri taraf injection lagayein.
reassurance: Isse dawai ke asar par koi farak nahi padta.

explanation: Redness and itching immediately after Cetrotide/Orgalutran is a known local reaction.
next_steps: Do not scratch. Wipe with a cool damp cloth.

explanation: Feeling teary or angry? High estrogen levels can make you feel like you have extreme PMS.
next_steps: Warn your partner/family that it's the meds talking!
reassurance: You are not going crazy. It's the hormones.

explanation: You mentioned your jeans are tight. This is NOT fat gain. It is water retention and enlarged ovaries.
next_steps: Wear loose, elastic-waist pants (leggings).
reassurance: This 'weight' will drop off quickly after your period starts post-cycle.

explanation: Agar pet phoola hua lag raha hai, toh ye fat nahi hai. Ye ovaries ka size badhne ki wajah se hai.
next_steps: Dheele kapde pehnein.
reassurance: Treatment khatam hote hi ye wapis normal ho jayega.

explanation: Feeling dizzy? It can happen due to blood pressure changes from meds.
next_steps: Sit down immediately. Drink salty lime water or ORS.

explanation: Sore breasts are due to high progesterone. It is normal.
next_steps: Wear a supportive sports bra.

explanation: Some medications (like Lupron) lower estrogen initially, causing dryness.
next_steps: You can use a water-based lubricant if needed.

explanation: Headaches are common when estrogen drops (suppression phase).
next_steps: Drink 3L water. You can take Paracetamol 650mg.
reassurance: It usually stops once stimulation injections begin.

explanation: Gentle Yoga is great! But avoid 'Twists', 'Inversions' (Headstand), and 'Hot Yoga'.
next_steps: Stick to breathing exercises (Pranayama) and stretching.
reassurance: Blood flow to the pelvis helps egg quality.

explanation: Halka Yoga safe hai. Par pet par dabav dalne wale aasan (poses) na karein.
next_steps: Kapalbhati avoid karein.
reassurance: Anulom-Vilom best hai stress ke liye.

explanation: You asked about Acupuncture. Studies show it can help reduce stress and improve blood flow before transfer.
next_steps: If you wish to try, do a session 24 hours before transfer.
reassurance: It is safe to combine with IVF.

explanation: Sleep is when your cells repair. Try to get 7-8 hours in total darkness.
next_steps: Melatonin supplements (if prescribed) help egg quality + sleep.

explanation: Strictly NO alcohol during stimulation and after transfer.
next_steps: Husband should also limit intake (affects sperm quality).
reassurance: Mocktails are your friend for now!

explanation: Hair dye is generally safe, but avoid strong chemical straightening treatments. Gel nails are fine but ensure good ventilation.
next_steps: Choose ammonia-free dye if possible.
reassurance: Looking good helps you feel good!

explanation: Gentle massage is okay. Deep tissue on tummy is NOT allowed.
next_steps: Avoid Saunas/Steam rooms (Overheating is bad for eggs/embryos).

explanation: Swimming is fine during early stims. Stop 3 days before retrieval (risk of infection).
next_steps: Avoid swimming after Transfer (vaginal progesterone washes out).

explanation: Cuddling your dog/cat reduces stress! Just don't let them jump on your tummy post-surgery.
next_steps: If you have a cat, ask someone else to change the litter box (Toxoplasmosis risk).

explanation: Extreme fasting raises cortisol. During IVF, we prefer steady blood sugar levels.
next_steps: Eat small regular meals rather than fasting for 16 hours.
reassurance: Your body thinks 'famine' is a bad time to reproduce.

explanation: As per policy, since the cycle was cancelled for medical reasons before retrieval, we will refund the 'Procedure Charges'.
next_steps: However, costs for medicines used and scans performed are non-refundable.
reassurance: We will process the eligible amount within 7 working days.

explanation: Cycle cancel hone par hum Doctor fee aur OT charges wapis kar denge. Dawai ka paisa wapis nahi hota.
next_steps: Accounts department aapko final hisaab bhejega.

explanation: IVF is a medical treatment. We can provide a stamped receipt.
next_steps: Please note: Most standard insurance does not cover IVF, so check with your CA for tax deduction eligibility.

explanation: Your IVF package is valid for 6 months. It expires on {{date}}.
next_steps: Please schedule your cycle before this date to avoid price hikes.

explanation: Since you cancelled the retrieval at the last minute, the OT slot was wasted.
next_steps: There is a nominal rescheduling fee of ‚Çπ{{fee}} to book the anesthetist again.
reassurance: I hope you understand the operational cost.

explanation: Received ‚Çπ{{amount}} via UPI/NEFT.
next_steps: Balance pending: ‚Çπ{{balance}}.

explanation: You can close your medical loan early with no penalty.
next_steps: Contact the loan provider directly.
reassurance: We have sent the 'Treatment Complete' letter.

explanation: Here is your medical certificate for 'Gynecological Procedure' (we don't write IVF to protect privacy).
next_steps: Recommended rest: 2 days.

explanation: We updated your address in our system.
next_steps: Important for courier delivery of meds.

explanation: We can issue a duplicate discharge summary.
next_steps: Fee: ‚Çπ200. Processing: 24 hours.

explanation: Your embryos have been with us for 2 years! Renewal fee is due.
next_steps: Pay to keep them safe for another year.
reassurance: They do not age in the freezer.

explanation: We received your request to discard remaining embryos since your family is complete.
next_steps: Both you and your husband must come to the clinic to sign the affidavit in front of a witness.
reassurance: We will handle them with respect.

explanation: Annual storage fee revised to ‚Çπ{{new_price}} from next month.
next_steps: Renew early to lock in old rate.

explanation: We have not received storage fees for 2 years. We have tried contacting you multiple times.
next_steps: If not paid by {{date}}, we are legally authorized to discard the samples.

explanation: Moving city? We can transfer your embryos to a clinic near you.
next_steps: Connect us with your new doctor.

explanation: Ice the area. Wear tight underwear for support.
next_steps: Sperm improvement takes 3-6 months.

explanation: You mentioned having high fever (102F) last week. This can temporarily kill sperm production.
next_steps: We should delay the IVF/IUI cycle by 2-3 months to let new sperm grow.
reassurance: Using this sperm might lead to poor embryo quality.

explanation: Tez bukhar se sperm quality kharab ho jati hai.
next_steps: Cycle ko 2 mahine delay karna behtar hoga.
reassurance: Hume best result chahiye, isliye wait karna sahi hai.

explanation: Do not keep laptop on lap. The heat affects testicles.
next_steps: Use a table.

explanation:
Myth: Long abstinence = More sperm. 
Fact: Old sperm has damaged DNA. 
Advice: 2-4 days gap is ideal.
next_steps: Ejaculate 3 days before pickup.

explanation: It is very common to have trouble performing on the day of IUI/IVF due to pressure.
next_steps: We can prescribe a tablet (Viagra) to help, or you can collect at home if you live nearby.
reassurance: Don't be embarrassed. We see this daily.

explanation: Agar sample dene mein tension ho rahi hai, toh batayein. Hum medicine de sakte hain.
next_steps: Ghabrayein nahi.
reassurance: Ye stress ki wajah se hota hai, normal hai.

explanation: Avoid standard lubricants (KY/Durex) - they kill sperm.
next_steps: Use 'Pre-Seed' or fertility-friendly lube.

explanation: Wear loose boxers to keep testicles cool.
next_steps: Avoid tight jeans.

explanation: Smoking causes DNA fragmentation in sperm. This leads to miscarriage for your wife.
next_steps: Stop NOW.
reassurance: Sperm regenerates every 3 months. You can fix this.

explanation: Aap keh rahe the ki 'Nazar' lag jayegi agar kisi ko bataya. Aap confidential rakh sakte hain.
next_steps: Hum clinic mein kisi ko aapka naam reveal nahi karte.
reassurance: Science aur Faith dono apni jagah hain.

explanation: Grahan mein injection lena ya bahar nikalna mana nahi hai medical science mein.
next_steps: Treatment schedule na todein.

explanation: Kesar lene se baby gora hoga - ye myth hai. Genetics rang decide karta hai.
next_steps: Kesar healthy hai, par limit mein lein (body heat).

explanation: Baingan (Eggplant) khane se miscarriage nahi hota. Ye safe hai.
next_steps: Sab tarah ki sabzi khayein.

explanation: You can visit temples/mosques. Just avoid crowded places to prevent infections (Flu/Covid) during pregnancy.
next_steps: Wear a mask.

explanation: Wife ko injections ke waqt support karein. Emotional stress unke liye kharab hai.
next_steps: Ghar ke kaam mein madad karein.

explanation: Aapne ladka/ladki janne ki baat ki. India mein ye illegal hai (PCPNDT Act). Hum jail ja sakte hain.
next_steps: Dobara ye sawal na puchein.
reassurance: Humare liye healthy baby important hai.

explanation: Diwali par mithai khayein, par sugar control mein rakhein (PCOS patients especially).
next_steps: 1-2 piece kaafi hain.

explanation: IVF does NOT mean mandatory C-Section. If no complications, you can have a vaginal birth.
next_steps: Discuss with your OB.
reassurance: Your body knows what to do.

explanation: IVF pregnancy mein normal delivery ho sakti hai. Operation tabhi hoga agar medical zaroorat ho.
next_steps: Darna nahi hai.

explanation: Poore 9 mahine bed rest ki zaroorat nahi hoti (unless bleeding ho). Active rehna achha hai.
next_steps: Ghar ke chhote kaam karein.
reassurance: Blood clot se bachne ke liye chalna zaroori hai.

explanation: Thinking of banking baby's cord blood? It stores stem cells for future use.
next_steps: We have tie-ups with Cryoviva/LifeCell.

explanation: Delivery ke time baby ki cord se blood save kar sakte hain future bimariyon ke liye.
next_steps: Costly hai par safety hai.

explanation: Watching you go from a nervous patient to a mother has been our privilege.
next_steps: Visit us with the baby!
reassurance: You are going to be amazing parents.

explanation: Aaj humara saath yahi tak tha. Aapki godh bhar gayi, hume aur kya chahiye.
next_steps: Baby ko lekar milne aana.
